alert.note: Alert for Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 11:47AM CST until January 12 at 12:30PM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Henry County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 1230 PM CST. * At 1146 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated a severe thunderstorm capable of producing damaging winds in excess of 60 mph. This storm was located near Abbeville, and moving northeast at 35 mph. * Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Newville, Shorterville, Hardwickburg, Capps, Otho, Scottsboro Crossroads, Double Bridges, Murphy Station, Graball, Screamer, Coates, Dancey, Thomas Mill Creek, Lawrenceville, Abbeville Municipal A/P and Willis Crossroads.
info.instruction: Severe thunderstorms produce damaging winds, deadly lightning and very heavy rain. For your protection, move to an interior room on the lowest floor of your home or business.
